data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Boavista awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Porto Boavista attack through Paulinho. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 4, Hugo Miguel awards Benfica a goal kick.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Boavista will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Benfica.
Boavista have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Can Boavista get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Boavista.
Boavista surge into the attack at Estadio do Bessa XXI but Miguel Reisinhoâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Show (Boavista) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 12, Darwin Nunez for Benfica is whistled offside.
Throw-in Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Benfica.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Boavista have been awarded a penalty in Porto...
In the minute 18, Goal! Angel Gomes gives Boavista a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 21, Hugo Miguel signals a Benfica throw-in in Boavista's half.
Hugo Miguel signals a Benfica throw-in in Boavista's half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Free kick Boavista.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Angel Gomes (Boavista) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
Paulinho (Boavista) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 30, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Jan Vertonghen (Benfica) strikes at Estadio do Bessa XXI but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
Can Boavista capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
In Porto Boavista drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 32, Show for Boavista gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Boavista.
Throw-in for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 35, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Boavista.
Boavista are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Benfica.
Goal! Boavista extend their lead to 2-0 through Alberth Elis.
Great play from Angel Gomes to set up the goal.
In the minute 39, In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
Hugo Miguel awards Boavista a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Boavista in their own half.
Benfica's Pizzi is whistled for offside at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 45, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Porto.
Free kick Boavista.
Boavista's Yanis Hamache breaks free at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Benfica have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica.
Reggie Cannon of Boavista smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 45, Jan Vertonghen (Benfica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, Hugo Miguel has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Throw-in Benfica.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Porto.
Jorge Jesus (Benfica) is making a first substitution, with Rafa Silva replacing Pizzi.
Haris Seferovic is replacing Gabriel Appelt for Benfica at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Everton with Julian Weigl. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Jesus.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
In the minute 49, Boavista drive upfield and Alberth Elis gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Benfica defender.
Corner awarded to Boavista.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Benfica.
In the minute 52, Benfica's Darwin Nunez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Boavista, close to Benfica's area.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
Hugo Miguel signals a Boavista throw-in in Benfica's half.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Alberth Elis for Boavista drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Boavista have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Free kick for Benfica in the half of Boavista.
In the minute 56, Jorge Jesus is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Diogo Goncalves replacing Gilberto.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Nicolas Otamendi (Benfica) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 57, Boavista have a goal kick.
Throw-in Benfica.
Benfica drive forward but Darwin Nunez is judged offside.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Benfica.
Show (Boavista) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Boavista in their own half.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Benfica.
Rafa Silva gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 62, Jorge Jesus is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio do Bessa XXI with Franco Cervi replacing Adel Taarabt.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 63, Boavista needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Important block from the Boavista defence as Luca Waldschmidt fires in a strike for Benfica.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Miguel Reisinho for Boavista has been booked by Hugo Miguel and receives a first yellow card.
Show has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
In the minute 66, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI, Nuno Tavares has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 66, Hugo Miguel waits before resuming play because Show for Boavista is still down.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica.
Vasco Seabra (Boavista) has taken off Show who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Sebastian Perez is the replacement.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Boavista.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Boavista.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Angel Gomes for Boavista who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Gustavo Sauer (Boavista) has replaced the possibly injured Angel Gomes at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 73, Boavista's Alberth Elis has run offside.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Boavista in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 74, Alberth Elis of Boavista is pulled up for offside.
Boavista needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 76, Boavista take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Yanis Hamache.
Paulinho with an assist there.
Goal kick for Boavista at Estadio do Bessa XXI.
In the minute 78, Hugo Miguel signals a Benfica throw-in in Boavista's half.
Ball safe as Boavista is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 79, Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Boavista in their own half.
Leo Jardim (Boavista) has received a yellow card from Hugo Miguel.
In the minute 81, Benfica to take a throw-in in Boavista territory.
Attention is being given to Boavistaâ€™s Yanis Hamache and play has been suspended briefly.
In Porto Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt is caught offside.
In the minute 83, Yanis Hamache is back on his feet again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Boavista's Alberth Elis gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 85, Boavista have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
In Porto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Boavista awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
The match at Estadio do Bessa XXI has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alberth Elis, who is down injured.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Boavista.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Vasco Seabra (Boavista) is making a third change, with Yusupha Njie replacing the possibly injured Alberth Elis.
Hugo Miguel awards Boavista a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Boavista.
At Estadio do Bessa XXI the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
Free kick Benfica.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Boavista's half?
Free kick for Boavista in the half of Benfica.
Can Boavista capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
Boavista's Yusupha Njie misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto.
Darwin Nunez for Benfica drives towards goal at Estadio do Bessa XXI. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Porto Benfica attack through Diogo Goncalves. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Boavista goal kick.
Yanis Hamache for Boavista is back on the field again.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Benfica.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Benfica's Diogo Goncalves has been booked in Porto.
Nicolas Otamendi is booked for the away team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Porto to check on Yanis Hamache, who is grimacing with pain.
